title.rendered: Terumo Needle 21G x 1.5 – Sterile Non-Toxic, Non Pyrogenic

content.rendered:
Terumo’s needles use a unique double bevel design and precision manufacturing to provide ultra sharp needles, which translate into greater comfort for the patient

This product contains no components made of natural rubber latex and their tamper-evident blister packs result in minimal waste disposal.

Features:

  • Smooth and easy puncture increasing patient comfort, precisely shaped needlepoint and perfect silicon coating
  • Suitable for all applications, wide range of products ranging from 18G 25 5/8G
  • UltraSharp Needles
  • Tamper Evident Peel Packs
  • Easy handling, ISO colour-coded needle hub and comprehensive information on the packaging
  • Easy recognition of flashback through the semi-transparent needle hub
  • Easy injection with thin-walled needles
  • Reduced risk of vascular perforation with short bevels

ARTG #:

– Terumo Needles     ARTG ID: 130227

– Terumo Syringes    ARTG ID: 129432
